message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110. It's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $105. It's a compromise, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
